# Other metadata

The following fields can be used in the metadata of article 
files and/or issue master files:

``` yaml
doi: 10.14806/dial.v75.i2.01
first-page: 27
last-page: 52
date: March 2023
copyright-date: 12 march 2024
special-issue: true
online-first: false
```

* `first-page`: article or issue metadata. Specify the first 
    page of an issue or article.
* `last-page`: article metadata. Specify the last page of the article.
* `date`: issue master. Date of the issue.
* `copyright-date`: article or issue metadata. Specify 
    the copyright year, that is, the year when the article or paper 
    is published, if different from from `date`.
* `special-issue`: issue metadata. typeset the issue as a special issue.
* `online-first`: article metadata. typeset the article as online first.

More details in comments to the `dialectica-meta-format.lua` 
filter.
